669.recipe: ["1. Spread one side of bread with margarine or butter. Sprinkle with cinnamon.","2. Cut into 1-inch cubes.","3. In lightly sprayed casserole dish, combine bread, sugar, and raisins. Then follow microwave or oven method below.","Microwave method:\n1. In bowl, blend eggs, milk, salt and vanilla. Pour liquid over bread mixture; lightly blend.","2. Cover, microwave on HIGH for 5 minutes. Turn dish 1/4 turn. Microwave on HIGH for 3-5 minutes longer (pudding is done when edges are firm and center is almost set).","3. Let sit covered for 10 minutes before serving. Serve warm or cold. Refrigerate leftovers.","Oven method:\n1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In bowl, blend eggs, 2 cups (instead of 1 1/4 cups for microwaving) milk, salt, and vanilla. Pour liquid over bread mixture; lightly blend.","2. Bake uncovered for 1 hour (pudding is done when a table knife inserted in the pudding comes out clean).","3. Serve warm or cold. Refrigerate leftovers."]
669.title: Old Fashioned Bread Pudding

670.ingredients: [2 cups Better Baking Mix, 1 cup water, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 eggs (beaten)]
670.recipe:
["1. Put all the ingredients in a bowl.
2. Stir just enough to moisten dry ingredients.
3. Preheat skillet on medium-high heat. The skillet is ready when drops of water "dance" on the dry surface. Add a teaspoon of vegetable oil or use cooking oil spray. For each pancake, pour 3-4 tablespoons of batter onto hot skillet.
4. Cook slowly until the surface is covered with bubbles. Turn and cook until second side is lightly browned."]
670.title: Pancakes (from Better Baking Mix)

671.ingredients: [2 bananas, 1/4 cup peanut butter, 1/4 cup crushed nuts]
671.recipe:
["1. Peel bananas. Spread the entire outside of each banana with peanut butter.
2. Roll the bananas in crushed nuts, sprinkles or other items.
3. Cut the bananas in one inch slices.
4. Store in the refrigerator or freezer until ready to serve."]
671.title: Peanut Butter Bananas

672.ingredients: [4 eggs, 1 cup milk, 1%, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 cup pineapple, crushed, undrained (8 ounce can), 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon (optional), 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg (optional), 1 teaspoon vanilla, 3 cups rice (cooked)]
672.recipe: ["1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly coat an oven safe 2 quart casserole dish with nonstick spray or oil.","2. In a large mixing bowl, beat together eggs, milk and sugar.","3. Add undrained crushed pineapple, cinnamon, nutmeg and vanilla.","4. Stir in cooked rice. Pour into prepared casserole dish.","5. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until a knife inserted in center of pudding comes out clean."]
672.title: Pineapple Rice Bake

673.ingredients: [2 tablespoons margarine (melted, or butter), 5 cups popcorn (popped), 3/4 cup raisins, 1 cup shredded wheat (bite-size), 1 tablespoon sugar (brown or white), 1 1/4 teaspoons cinnamon]
673.recipe: ["1. Pop popcorn.","2. Mix popped corn, raisins, and cereal in a large bowl.","3. Mix sugar and cinnamon in small dish.","4. Drizzle melted margarine or butter over mixture.","5. Add sugar and cinnamon mixture.","6. Shake or stir until all ingredients are evenly distributed."]
673.title: Popcorn Treats

674.ingredients: [6 us fluid ounces grape juice (frozen), 1 cup water (cold), 1/3 cup milk (nonfat, dry), 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 cup ice (or more)]
674.recipe: ["1. Place all ingredients in blender or food processor.","2. Secure lid and blend until smooth. Serve immediately."]
674.title: Purple Cow

675.ingredients: [1 cup whole milk, 1 cup water, 1 cup rice, uncooked, 2 eggs, 1 cup evaporated milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1/4 cup sugar, 1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon]
675.recipe: ["1. In sauce pan, heat milk and water.","2. Add rice, bring to boil, lower heat to simmer; stir mixture every 10 minutes. Cook uncovered until rice is tender, about 30 minutes.","3. In large bowl, mix eggs, 3/4 cup evaporated milk, vanilla, and sugar. Set aside.","4. Add remaining 1/4 cup evaporated milk to rice mixture.","5. Spoon 1 cup of rice mixture into egg mixture and stir. Pour egg-rice mixture into remaining rice.","6. Heat pudding until it boils, stirring continuously. Remove from heat, and sprinkle with cinnamon."]
675.title: Rice Pudding

676.ingredients: [2 cups milk (skim or low-fat 1%), 1 carton pudding mix (3 1/2 ounce box, instant vanilla), 2 banana (peeled, sliced or other sliced fruit)]
676.recipe:
["1. Place 2 cups of milk in a quart jar with tight-fitting lid.
2. Add one small package of instant vanilla pudding mix to the jar; screw lid on jar.
3. Shake until mixture is smooth.
4. Place pieces of fruit in a serving bowl or paper cups.
5. Pour pudding over fruit and chill."]
676.title: Shake-A-Pudding

677.ingredients: [3 3/4 cups milk (fat-free), 2 instant vanilla pudding and pie-filling mix (small packages 4 serving size, fat-free, sugar free), 32 vanilla wafers, 2 bananas (medium, sliced), 2 cups frozen whipped topping (light)]
677.recipe: ["1. Wash hands with soap and water.","2. Mix 3½ cups of the milk with the pudding mixes. Beat the pudding mixture with a wire whisk for 2 minutes until it is well blended. Let stand for 5 minutes.","3. Fold 1 cup of the whipped topping into the pudding mix.","4. Arrange a layer of wafers on the bottom and sides of a 2-quart serving bowl. Drizzle 2 tablespoons of the remaining milk over the wafers. Add a layer of banana slices and top with one-third of the pudding.","5. Repeat layers, drizzling each wafer layer with remaining milk and ending with pudding. Spread the remaining whipped topping over the pudding.","6. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours before serving."]
677.title: Southern Banana Pudding

678.ingredients: [1 cup Better Baking Mix, 1/2 cup brown sugar, packed (or white sugar), 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/3 cup raisins (optional), 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 egg, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla]
678.recipe:
["1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Lightly grease baking sheet.
2. In a mixing bowl, combine baking mix, sugar, cinnamon, and raisins (optional). Stir to mix.
3. Put oil, egg, and vanilla in a small bowl. Beat with a fork to mix.
4. Add oil and egg mix to the dry ingredients.
5. Stir to combine. Dough will be thick.
6. Measure level tablespoons of dough. Drop on cookie sheet about 2 inches apart. Dough with spread into cookies 2 1/2 to 3 inches wide as it bakes.
7. Bake 10-12 minutes or until edges start to turn brown. Be careful not to overbake.
8. Remove cookies from baking sheet while still warm."]
678.title: Sugar and Spice Cookies (from Better Baking Mix)

679.ingredients: [4 sweet potatoes (about 1 lb), 3 egg whites, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 can evaporated milk, nonfat (12 ounce), 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg, 1/2 teaspoon ginger]
679.recipe: ["1. Rinse sweet potatoes in cold running water and pierce with a fork.","2. Microwave sweet potatoes on full power until tender, about 15 minutes. Turn them half way during baking.","3. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Remove skin from sweet potatoes and mash with hand beaters or food processor. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until smooth.","4. Pour mixture in an 8 inch baking dish. Bake until casserole is firm in the center, about 40 minutes.","5. Remove pan from oven. Allow to stand for 5 minutes then cut into 10 squares.","6. Serve hot. Refrigerate leftovers."]
679.title: Sweet Potato Casserole

680.ingredients: [2 tablespoons 1% low fat milk, 1 1/2 teaspoons brown sugar, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/4 cup quick cooking oats, dry, 2 3/4 cups low-sodium sweet potatoes, drained and chopped (about 15 ounces)]
680.recipe: ["1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.","2. In a small bowl, combine milk, brown sugar, cinnamon, and oatmeal. Mix well and set aside.","3. In a medium-size baking pan, add the sweet potatoes so that they cover the bottom of the pan.","4. Add the oatmeal mixture on top of the sweet potatoes.","5. Bake for 20 minutes. Serve hot or refrigerate and serve cold."]
680.title: Sweet Potato Casserole

681.ingredients: [1 cup gingersnaps (finely crumbed, or graham crackers), 3 tablespoons butter (unsalted, melted), 8 ounces cream cheese (light, softened), 1 cup sweet potatoes (mashed, peeled and cooked), 1/3 cup sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice, 1 teaspoon orange peel (finely shredded), 1 teaspoon vanilla, 5 egg whites, 1 cup milk (evaporated, reduced fat 2%)]
681.recipe:
["Crust:
1. Combine crumbs and butter. Press mixture into bottom and 1 inch up sides of an 8 inch spring form pan. Set aside","Filling:
1. In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sweet potatoes, egg white, sugar, pumpkin pie spice, orange peel and the vanilla until combined. DO NOT OVER BEAT.
2. Stir in milk. Carefully pour into prepared pan.
3. Bake at 350 degrees for 60-70 minutes until center appears set.
4. Cool on wire rack for 45 minutes. Cover and chill thoroughly.
5. Remove sides of pan.
6. Garnish with dessert topping and orange peel."]
681.title: Sweet Potato Cheesecake

682.ingredients: [1 cup sweet potato (cooked, mashed), 1/2 cup banana (mashed), 1 cup evaporated milk (fat-free), 1/8 cup brown sugar (2 Tablespoons, packed), 2 egg yolk (beaten, or 1/3 cup egg substitute), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cooking spray (as needed, non-stick), 1/4 cup raisins, 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon (ground)]
682.recipe: ["1. In a medium bowl, stir together sweet potato and banana.","2. Add milk, blending well.","3. Add brown sugar, egg yolks, and salt, mixing thoroughly.","4. Spray casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray. Transfer sweet potato mixture to casserole dish.","5. Bake in pre-heated 325° oven for 35 minutes, Remove from oven.","6. Combine raisins, sugar, and cinnamon; sprinkle over top of sweet potato mixture.","7. Return to oven and bake 10 more minutes."]
682.title: Sweet Potato Custard

683.ingredients: [1 cup hot water (8 fluid ounces), 2 cups sugar, 2 tablespoons margarine, 4 cups dry milk powder, nonfat]
683.recipe: ["1. In order listed, put ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.","2. Store in the refrigerator for up to one week."]
683.title: Sweetened Condensed Milk

684.ingredients: [3 cups crispy rice cereal, 3 cups toasted oat cereal, 1 1/2 cups raisins, 1/2 cup sunflower seeds, 1 cup honey, 3/4 cup sugar, 1 jar chunky peanut butter (16 ounces), 1 teaspoon vanilla]
684.recipe: ["1. Combine dry ingredients in bowl.","2. Combine honey and sugar in pan and bring to a boil.","3. Add peanut butter and vanilla, stir until peanut butter melts.","4. Pour mixture over cereal and mix well.","5. Press into a 13x9\" pan and cool."]
684.title: Trail Mix Bars

685.ingredients: [pretzels (1 cup), square corn, rice or wheat cereal (1 cup), 1 cup round oat cereal, 1 cup popcorn, goldfish crackers (1 cup), 1/4 cup raisins, dried cranberries (1/4 cup), dried banana chips (1/4 cup), dried pineapple (1/4 cup), 1/4 cup peanuts, soy nuts (1/4 cup)]
685.recipe: ["1. Wash hands; get out utensils.","2. Choose the ingredients you want to use.","3. Measure the suggested amounts of chosen ingredients and add to mixing bowl.","4. Mix ingredients using stirring spoon and divide evenly into 4 storage bags.","5. Enjoy your Trail Treat."]
685.title: Trail Treat

686.ingredients: [2 Tbsp(30 mL)tahini, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)maple syrup, 1 Tbsp(7 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, 1medium banana, 1medium (19 cm) soft tortilla, 1 Tbsp(8 g)roasted hazelnuts, chopped , fresh berries, powdered sugar]
686.recipe: ["1. In a small bowl, mix together the tahini, maple syrup, and cocoa powder.","2. Slice the banana in half, then into strips, lengthwise.","3. Spread the tahini mixture evenly on the tortilla and then place the tortilla on a large pan on medium heat. Top with the banana slices and chopped hazelnuts.","4. When the tortilla starts to become golden, gently fold the tortilla in half and press down with the back of a spatula. You can also roll the filled tortilla into a burrito and toast it in the pan for a neater \"to-go\" option.","5. Remove the tortilla from the pan, cut it in half, and add your desired toppings. Enjoy!"]
686.title: Warm Tahini Chocolate Banana Wrap

687.ingredients: [1½cups(225 g)frozen strawberries, 1 Tbsp(14 g)granulated sugar, ½cup(75 g)quick-cooking tapioca boba pearls, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)agave syrup, ⅔cup(160 mL)unsweetened oat milk†, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)vegan whipping cream (optional) , 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, 2cups(222 g)ice cubes, fresh strawberries]
687.recipe: ["1. To a saucepan, add the frozen strawberries and sugar. Cook on medium heat until the strawberries have thawed. Use the back of a spoon to lightly mash the strawberries.","2. Remove the pan from the stove and use an immersion blender or standing blender to purée the strawberries. Set aside to cool.","3. Cook the tapioca pearls according to the package instructions. For us, this took 5 minutes.","4. Drain the tapioca pearls, and rinse under cold water to stop the cooking process. Add the pearls to a bowl and mix in the agave syrup.","5. In a pitcher, combine the oat milk, whipping cream, and vanilla.","6. Divide the tapioca pearls between your glasses, and spoon some of the strawberry purée over the pearls.","7. Top with ice, followed by the vanilla cream milk. Finish with some fresh strawberries if desired. Enjoy!"]
687.title: Strawberry Milk Bubble Tea

688.ingredients: [2 Tbsp(28 g)brown sugar, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)boiling water, ½cup(75 g)quick-cooking tapioca boba pearls, 2 tsp(4 g)matcha powder†, ½cup(120 mL)hot water, at around 80°C/175°F†, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, 1cup(111 g)ice cubes, 2½cups(600 mL)barista oat milk†]
688.recipe: ["1. Add the brown sugar and boiling water to a bowl. Stir vigorously until the sugar has dissolved.","2. In a saucepan, cook the tapioca pearls according to the package instructions. For us, this took about 5 minutes.","3. Drain the tapioca pearls, rinse under cold water, and transfer to the brown sugar syrup jar. Give it a mix.","4. Sift the matcha powder into a bowl. Then add the hot water. Use a matcha whisk* to whisk until there’s a foam layer on top of the matcha.","5. Add the vanilla extract to the matcha mixture and whisk again until combined.","6. Divide the brown sugar pearls between the glasses, top with the ice cubes, milk, and lastly the matcha. Enjoy!"]
688.title: Brown Sugar Matcha Bubble Tea

689.ingredients: [2 Tbsp(12 g)loose black tea leaves, 1cup(240 mL)boiling water, ½cup(75 g)quick-cooking tapioca boba pearls, ¼cup(60 mL)maple syrup, ¼cup(23 g)sweetened ube spread, plus more to taste , 1½cups(360 mL)unsweetened soy milk, divided †, 1cup(200 g)crushed ice]
689.recipe: ["1. Steep the tea in the boiling water for 5 minutes.","2. Cook the tapioca pearls according to the package directions. For us, this took 5 minutes.","3. When cooked, drain the pearls, and rinse under cold water. Transfer to a container and add the maple syrup.","4. Mix the ube spread with a splash of the milk in a small bowl to thin it out a bit.","5. To assemble, divide the pearls between the glasses. Add the ube mixture over the pearls.","6. Then add ice, pour over the remaining milk, and top with the tea.","7. Stir well and taste test. Different brands of ube spread vary in sweeteness, so add more thinned-out ube spread to taste if desired. Enjoy!"]
689.title: Ube Bubble Tea

690.ingredients: [1cup(240 mL)water, 1 Tbsp(6 g)loose rooibos tea leaves, 1 Tbsp(6 g)loose black tea leaves, 2star anises, 2whole cloves, 2cardamom pods, cracked, 2 tsp(10 mL)pure vanilla extract, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)boiling water, 2 Tbsp(28 g)brown sugar, ½cup(75 g)quick-cooking tapioca boba pearls†, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)sweetened condensed coconut milk, plus more to taste (optional) , 1½cups(166 g)ice cubes, 2cups(480 mL)unsweetened oat milk]
690.recipe: ["1. In a saucepan, bring the water, tea leaves, anise, cloves, and cardamom to a boil.","2. Once boiling, remove from heat, cover, and let sit for an hour to steep.","3. Meanwhile, make a simple syrup by whisking together the water and brown sugar in a bowl until the sugar is dissolved.","4. In a large pot, cook the pearls according to package directions. For us, this took 5 minutes.","5. Strain the pearls, rinse under cold water to stop the cooking process, and transfer them to the syrup container.","6. Once the tea has steeped, place a sieve over a mason jar and strain the tea into the jar. Then add the vanilla extract and stir to combine.","7. To assemble, add some sweetened condensed milk to each cup. Then add the pearls, ice, milk, and tea concentrate. Stir, and enjoy!"]
690.title: Thai Iced Bubble Tea

691.recipe: ["1. In a heatproof bowl, break the chocolate into small pieces. This helps the chocolate to melt faster and more evenly.","2. Using the microwave method: microwave at 600W for 20-second intervals, stirring in between. When the chocolate is nearly fully melted, stop microwaving and continue to stir with a spoon. The heat from the bowl will melt the remaining bits of chocolate.","3. Using the stovetop a.k.a. \"a double boiler\": fill a saucepan with an inch (2 cm) of boiling water. Place the large heatproof bowl on top of the saucepan. The water should not touch the bottom of the bowl. Keep the water at a simmer over low heat. Continuously stir until the chocolate is fully melted."]
691.title: How to Melt Chocolate

692.ingredients: [10.5 oz(300 g)silken tofu, drained, 7 oz(200 g)melted dairy-free dark chocolate†, ½ tsppure vanilla extract, ¼ tspground cardamom (optional), ¼cup(56 g)granulated sugar, divided, 4cups(492 g)fresh raspberries, divided , ½cup(120 mL)vegan whipping cream, 1 Tbsp(7 g)cream stabilizer, caramel shards, chocolate shavings]
692.recipe: ["1. To a food processor, add the tofu, melted chocolate, vanilla, cardamom, and half the sugar. Blend until smooth.","2. To each of the serving glasses, add ¼ cup of raspberries. Lightly mash the raspberries with the back of a spoon or tamper.","3. Reserve about ¼ of the blended chocolate mixture in a bowl. Divide the remaining between your glasses over the mashed raspberries. Place the glasses in the fridge while preparing the next layer.","4. To a large bowl, add the whipping cream, cream stabilizer, and remaining sugar. Whip on medium-high with an electric hand mixer for about 7 minutes, or until stiff peaks form. Reserve some of the whipped cream as a topping if desired.","5. Then add the reserved blended chocolate mixture to the remaining whipped cream and gently fold together.","6. Remove the cups from the fridge and add some raspberries (or other berries) as the next layer.","7. Then divide this whipped chocolate mousse between the glasses.","8. Top with the reserved whipped cream and any desired garnishes. Enjoy!"]
692.title: Layered Chocolate Raspberry Mousse

693.recipe: ["1. Line a baking tray with parchment paper. In a heavy-bottomed saucepan* on medium heat, add the sugar and water.","2. Avoid mixing with spoons or utensils as this can cause sugar crystals to form. If the mixture needs it, swirl the pan to help dissolve the sugar.","3. When the sugar is dissolved, turn the heat to medium-high and allow the mixture to bubble until it starts to turn golden, about 10 - 15 minutes.","4. Watch the sugar closely to avoid burning, as caramelization happens quickly. When caramelized to your liking, carefully** pour the liquid sugar onto the prepared baking tray.","5. Tilt the tray to spread the sugar out if desired for thinner shards.","6. Once completely cooled, use the back of a spoon to tap the caramel and break it into shards. For finer caramel dust, you can use a rolling pin to crush the caramel or place the pieces in a food processor and pulse a few times. Enjoy!"]
693.title: Caramel Shards

694.ingredients: [2 tsp(4 g)espresso powder, ¼cup(60 mL)boiling water, ⅓cup(80 mL)cold water, ½ tspalmond extract, 1cup(232 g)plain vegan cream cheese†, ⅓cup(80 mL)sweetened condensed coconut milk, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, 12digestive cookies, 1 tsp(2 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder]
694.recipe: ["1. In a small bowl, dissolve the espresso powder in the boiling water. Then add the cold water and almond extract and mix again.","2. To a medium bowl, add the cream cheese, condensed milk, and vanilla extract. Use a electric hand mixer* to mix until smooth.","3. Break one or two cookies into a few pieces, dropping them into the espresso mixture. Then immediately scoop it out and transfer it to the bottom of your serving cup. Use a spoon to crush the cookies in the cup.","4. Spread a layer of cream (about 3 Tbsp) on top, followed by some more cookie pieces that have been dipped in the espresso mixture.","5. Add a final layer of cream, and then sift some cocoa powder on top. Enjoy right away, or let it chill for 1 hour in the fridge to let the flavours meld."]
694.title: Tiramisu-Inspired Trifle

695.ingredients: [¾cup(177 g)passion fruit pulp†, ½cup(75 g)frozen mango chunks, 2 tsp(9 g)granulated sugar, 1⅓cups(320 mL)coconut cream†, 2 Tbsp(17 g)powdered sugar, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, 5.8 oz(165 g)Biscoff speculoos cookies, 2 Tbsp(28 g)unsalted vegan butter, chopped mango, toasted coconut flakes]
695.recipe: ["1. Place a sieve over a saucepan and strain out the passion fruit seeds. Set the seeds aside if desired, to use for garnish.","2. With the saucepan over medium-high heat, add the mango and sugar. Cook at a gentle simmer for 4 minutes, until slightly thickened. Set aside to cool.","3. In a large bowl, use an electric hand mixer to whip the coconut cream* for a few minutes. Then add the sugar and vanilla and whip again.","4. Add the cookies and butter to a food processor and blend into a crumb. Then add 2 Tbsp of the cookie crumbs to each serving glass and press down to form a crust on the bottom.","5. In the now-empty food processor, blend the mango mixture until puréed.","6. Spoon a heaping ¼ cup of the coconut whipping cream on top of the cookie layer, followed by a tablespoon of the passion fruit mixture. Garnish as desired, and enjoy!"]
695.title: Coconut Mango Passion Fruit Trifle

696.ingredients: [1cup(170 g)uncooked quinoa, rinsed, 1½cups(360 mL)unsweetened soy milk, 1⅔cups(399 mL)canned full-fat coconut milk, 3 Tbsp(41 g)brown sugar, 3 Tbsp(21 g)ground flaxseeds, 3 Tbsp(20 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, 2 tsp(10 mL)pure vanilla extract, ½ tspground cinnamon, ¼ tspsalt, 2medium bananas, sliced, fresh berries, maple syrup, unsweetened coconut yogurt]
696.recipe: ["1. In a saucepan, combine the quinoa, soy and coconut milk, brown sugar, flaxseed, cocoa powder, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a gentle simmer.","2. Add the bananas into the porridge and stir. Simmer for 20 - 25 minutes, partially covered. The quinoa should have absorbed all the liquid and the bananas should be cooked down.","3. Remove from the heat and cover for 5 minutes before serving up. Top with fresh berries and yogurt, and enjoy!"]
696.title: Chocolate Quinoa Porridge

697.ingredients: [10.5 oz(300 g)dairy-free dark chocolate, chopped, 1⅓cups(320 mL)sweetened condensed coconut milk, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, flaked sea salt]
697.recipe: ["1. Fill a saucepan with 2 cm of water, and bring to a gentle boil. Place a heat-safe bowl on top of the pan to create a 'double boiler'. Place the chocolate in the bowl and stir often. The heat from the bowl will melt the chocolate.","2. Once the chocolate has melted, turn off the heat and stir the condensed coconut milk and vanilla into the chocolate.","3. Line a 6 x 6 inch (16 x 16 cm) square baking dish with parchment paper and transfer the mixture to the dish. Sprinkle flaked sea salt on top if desired. Place in the freezer for at least 2 hours to harden.","4. To make cutting easier, try running your knife under hot water before cutting the fudge. Enjoy!"]
697.title: Vegan Chocolate Fudge

698.ingredients: [7.9 oz(224 g)unsalted vegan butter, at room temperature, 2¼cups(302 g)powdered sugar, ¾cup(80 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, ⅓cup(80 mL)unsweetened soy milk, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, ⅓cup(93 g)melted dairy-free dark chocolate, vanilla caramel cake, vegan chocolate cake]
698.recipe: ["1. To a large bowl, add the butter and use an electric hand mixer to beat the butter until soft and fluffy.","2. Then add the powdered sugar, cocoa powder, milk, and vanilla. Mix at a low speed and gradually increase until everything is well combined.","3. Add the melted chocolate and mix again. The frosting is now ready to use on cakes and cupcakes!"]
698.title: Vegan Chocolate Buttercream Frosting

699.ingredients: [1cup(81 g)rolled oats, 2cups(480 mL)unsweetened almond milk†, 1medium banana, sliced, ½cup(75 g)frozen blueberries, 2 Tbsp(14 g)ground flaxseeds, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)maple syrup, ½ tsppure vanilla extract, ⅛ tspalmond extract (optional), 1medium banana, sliced, ½cup(75 g)fresh blueberries, ⅔cup(160 mL)unsweetened coconut yogurt†, 3 Tbsp(45 mL)almond butter, ground cinnamon, sliced roasted almonds]
699.recipe: ["1. To a saucepan, add the oats, milk, banana, blueberries, and flaxseeds. Bring to a gentle boil, then reduce to a simmer for 7 minutes, stirring on occasion to prevent burning.","2. Take the pan off the heat and stir in the maple syrup, vanilla, and almond extract.","3. Divide the oatmeal between the bowls and top with banana slices, fresh blueberries, yogurt, and almond butter. Enjoy!"]
699.title: Blueberry Almond Oatmeal

700.ingredients: [1cup(81 g)rolled oats, 2cups(480 mL)unsweetened almond milk†, ⅓cup(35 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, 2 tsp(2 g)instant coffee granules, 1.7 oz(50 g)dairy-free dark chocolate, roughly chopped, divided, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)maple syrup, 1 pinchsalt (optional) , 2small bananas, sliced, ¼cup(60 mL)unsweetened coconut yogurt†, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)hazelnut butter, 2 Tbsp(14 g)roasted hazelnuts, chopped (optional) ]
700.recipe: ["1. To a saucepan, add the oats, milk, cacao powder, and instant coffee. Bring to a gentle boil, then reduce to a simmer for 7 - 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Take the pot off the heat and stir in half of the chopped chocolate and all of the maple syrup and salt.","2. Divide the oatmeal between the bowls. Top with banana, yogurt, hazelnut butter, hazelnuts, and the remaining chopped chocolate. Enjoy!"]
700.title: Mocha Hazelnut Oatmeal

701.ingredients: [1cup(81 g)rolled oats, 2cups(480 mL)unsweetened soy milk, 1 tsp(3 g)ground cinnamon, ½ tspground ginger, ¼ tspground cloves (optional), ⅛ tspground allspice (optional) , 2 Tbsp(14 g)ground flaxseeds, 2 tsp(10 mL)maple syrup, 1 tsp(5 mL)blackstrap molasses (optional) , 1pear, thickly sliced lengthwise, 2 tsp(10 mL)maple syrup, ½cup(120 mL)unsweetened coconut yogurt, 3 Tbsp(20 g)chopped roasted pecans]
701.recipe: ["1. To a saucepan, add the oats, milk, cinnamon, ginger, cloves, and allspice. Bring to a gentle boil, then reduce to a simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.","2. Meanwhile, to a medium pan on medium-high heat, add the sliced pear and the maple syrup. Let the pear caramelize for about 4 minutes while stirring and flipping the pear slices occasionally. Take off the heat.","3. To the saucepan of oatmeal, add the flaxseeds, maple syrup, and molasses and let it cook for another 1 - 2 minutes. Add more milk if you prefer a thinner consistency.","4. Divide the oatmeal, caramelized pear, yogurt, and pecans between the bowls. Enjoy!"]
701.title: Gingerbread Oatmeal with Caramelized Pear

702.ingredients: [1 Tbsp(14 g)granulated sugar, 2 tsp(4 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 tsp(1 g)instant coffee granules, 0.2 oz(6 g)dairy-free dark chocolate, finely chopped†, 1 tsp(4 g)peppermint candies, finely chopped†, ½cup(120 mL)boiling water, 2cups(480 mL)barista oat milk†, chocolate shavings, peppermint candies, vegan whipped cream]
702.recipe: ["1. In a jar, mix the sugar, cocoa powder, instant coffee, chocolate, and peppermint*.","2. Mix 1½ Tbsp of the powdered mix with ¼ cup (60 mL) of boiling water in each mug and stir to dissolve.","3. Then add 1 cup (240 mL) hot milk per mug and stir.","4. Top with whipped cream, chocolate shavings, and peppermint pieces if desired. Enjoy!"]
702.title: Peppermint Mocha

703.ingredients: [2¼ tsp(4 g)butterfly pea powder†, 1 tsp(4 g)vanilla sugar, ¼ tspground ginger, ¼ tspground cardamom, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)boiling water, 2cups(480 mL)barista oat milk†]
703.recipe: ["1. Mix together all the powdered mix ingredients in a jar*.","2. To make each latte, add 2 tsp of the powdered mix and 1 Tbsp (15 mL) of boiling water to each cup. Stir to dissolve.","3. Then add 1 cup (240 mL) of hot milk to each cup, stir, and enjoy!"]
703.title: Blue Butterfly Pea Latte

704.ingredients: [1 Tbsp+1 tsp(10 g)beetroot powder†, 2 tsp(4 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, 2 tsp(4 g)espresso powder, 1½ tsp(6 g)vanilla sugar, 1½ tsp(7 g)granulated sugar, ¼cup(60 mL)boiling water, 2cups(480 mL)barista oat milk†]
704.recipe: ["1. Mix all of the powdered mix ingredients together in a bowl or a jar*.","2. To make each latte, add 1½ Tbsp of the powdered mix to a cup and pour over 2 Tbsp (30 mL) of boiling water. Stir to dissolve.","3. Then pour in 1 cup (240 mL) of hot barista oat milk. Top with foamed milk if desired, and enjoy!"]
704.title: Red Velvet Latte

705.ingredients: [4 tsp(17 g)vanilla sugar, 2 tsp(4 g)matcha powder†, 1 tsp(4 g)coconut sugar, 1½cups(360 mL)barista oat milk†, 1cup(240 mL)canned light coconut milk, ¼cup(60 mL)hot water, at around 80°C/175°F]
705.recipe: ["1. To a jar, add the vanilla sugar, matcha powder, and coconut sugar. Mix to combine*.","2. To a saucepan, add the oat milk and coconut milk to heat up. Whisk throughout, and remove from the heat when hot, but not yet boiling.","3. To make one latte, add 1 Tbsp of the powdered mix and 2 Tbsp (30 mL) of hot water to each cup. Avoid using boiling water straight out of the kettle as this can make the matcha bitter. Whisk until no lumps remain.","4. Divide the hot milk between your cups and top with foamed milk, if desired. Enjoy!"]
705.title: Vanilla Coconut Matcha Latte

706.ingredients: [2cups(448 g)granulated sugar, 1vanilla pod, blue butterfly pea latte, golden latte instant mix, red velvet latte]
706.recipe: ["1. Add the sugar to a food processor.","2. Use a small paring knife to slice the vanilla pod in half lengthwise, but try to not cut all the way through.","3. Open the vanilla along the newly cut seam and use the back of the knife to scrape out the seeds. Add this to the food processor as well. Reserve the emptied vanilla pod for a later step.","4. Blend the sugar for about 3 - 4 minutes, or until you achieve a fine, almost powder-like consistency. Pour the vanilla sugar into a jar.","5. Submerge the reserved, empty pod into the sugar. If the pod doesn't fit into your jar, cut it into smaller pieces.","6. Store the vanilla sugar at room temperature in a cool and dry place for at least 2 weeks for optimal flavour. Make sure to give the jar or container a shake every few weeks as there is a possibility that the sugar can clump together."]
706.title: Homemade Vanilla Sugar

707.ingredients: [3cups(243 g)rolled oats, 1cup(143 g)raw almonds, chopped, ½cup(72 g)raw pumpkin seeds, ½cup(62 g)raw sunflower seeds, ¾cup(56 g)unsweetened shredded coconut, ½cup(120 mL)maple syrup, ¼cup(60 mL)melted refined coconut oil†, ¼ tspsalt, dairy-free dark chocolate chips, dried cranberries, hemp seeds, whole chia seeds]
707.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 250°F (120°C) and line a baking tray. In a large bowl, mix together the oats, almonds, seeds, and coconut.","2. Pour the maple syrup, coconut oil, and salt over the oat mixture and toss it to coat. Transfer to the baking tray and bake on the centre rack of the oven for 60 - 70 minutes*, or until lightly golden. Stir every 15 - 20 minutes.","3. When removed from the oven, let cool completely. It will continue to harden as it cools. If adding any dried fruits, stir it in now, then transfer the granola to an airtight container or large glass storage jar. Enjoy!"]
707.title: Toasted Coconut & Almond Granola

708.ingredients: [1 cup(200 g)uncooked short-grain white rice, washed, soaked 4 hours†, ¼cup(60 mL)water, 3cups(720 mL)unsweetened oat milk, ¼cup(56 g)granulated sugar, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)rose water†, ¼ tspground cardamom, dried red rose petals, ground cinnamon, roasted pistachios]
708.recipe: ["1. To a saucepan on medium-high heat, add the drained rice and water. Let the rice soak up all the water while stirring occasionally, this will take about 5 minutes.","2. Add the oat milk, bring the milk to a very light simmer and cook uncovered for 20 - 25 minutes, stirring every few minutes. Stir occasionally.","3. When the rice is cooked, add the sugar and cook for 2 more minutes. Make sure to keep an eye on it, as the sugar can burn quickly.","4. Remove the pan from the heat, stir in the rosewater and cardamom, and allow it to cool off completely. Garnish with cinnamon**, rose petals, and pistachios, and enjoy!"]
708.title: Shir Berinj - Afghan Rice Pudding

709.ingredients: [12soft Medjool dates, 6pretzel sticks, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)peanut butter, flaked sea salt, melted dairy-free dark chocolate]
709.recipe: ["1. Using a sharp paring knife, make an incision along the length of each date, but try not to cut the date in half.","2. Remove the pits from the dates.","3. Break apart the pretzel and place the pieces inside the empty dates.","4. Dollop the peanut butter over the pretzel.","5. If desired, drizzle the filled dates with melted chocolate and a sprinkle of sea salt. Enjoy!"]
709.title: Pretzel Stuffed Dates

710.ingredients: [1cup(14 g)puffed rice, 1cup(240 mL)peanut butter, ½cup(38 g)toasted shredded coconut, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)maple syrup, or more if you like it sweeter, ½ tsppure vanilla extract, ¼ tspsalt, ¼cup(60 g)mini dark chocolate chips, unsweetened shredded coconut]
710.recipe: ["1. To a large bowl, add the puffed rice, peanut butter, coconut, maple syrup, vanilla, and salt*. Mix. Add the chocolate chips, and mix again.","2. Using a tablespoon measure, scoop a large spoonful of dough into your hands and roll it into a ball**. Repeat with remaining dough until finished.","3. Optional step: roll the energy balls through extra toasted shredded coconut. Enjoy!"]
710.title: Peanut Butter Cookie Dough Energy Balls

711.ingredients: [1½cups(360 mL)peanut butter, 2 Tbsp(18 g)roasted pumpkin seeds, 2 Tbsp(18 g)roasted sunflower seeds, 1 Tbsp(10 g)whole chia seeds, 1 Tbsp(10 g)hemp seeds, 1 Tbsp(9 g)toasted sesame seeds, 1 Tbsp(7 g)ground flaxseeds, classic comforting oatmeal, classic creamy steel-cut oatmeal, super seed stuffed dates]
711.recipe: ["1. To a mason jar, add the peanut butter and all the seeds.","2. Mix to evenly distribute, and enjoy!"]
711.title: Super Seed Nut Butter

712.ingredients: [15soft Medjool dates, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)peanut butter, 1 tsp(3 g)raw pumpkin seeds, 1 tsp(3 g)raw sunflower seeds, ½ tspwhole chia seeds, ½ tsptoasted sesame seeds, ½ tsphemp seeds, hemp seeds, melted dairy-free dark chocolate]
712.recipe: ["1. Using a sharp paring knife, make an incision along the length of each date, but try not to cut the date in half. Remove the pits from the dates.","2. In a small bowl, combine the peanut butter, pumpkin, sunflower, chia, sesame, and hemp seeds.","3. Dollop the peanut butter mixture into the dates.","4. If desired, drizzle the filled dates with melted chocolate and extra hemp seeds. Enjoy!"]
712.title: Super Seed Stuffed Dates

713.ingredients: [1½cups(360 mL)canned full-fat coconut milk†, ½cup(112 g)granulated sugar, sweetened condensed milk iced coffee]
713.recipe: ["1. Add the coconut milk and sugar to a heavy-bottomed* saucepan. Bring to a gentle boil over medium-high heat while stirring occasionally.","2. Turn the heat to low, and let the milk very gently simmer for 45 minutes. Be careful to not let it simmer too aggressively. Give it a stir every 5 - 10 minutes. The mixture should reduce in volume by about half in that time.","3. The condensed milk is ready when it has slightly thickened but is still pourable. When a spoon is dipped into the mixture, it should leave a thin layer on the spoon when the spoon is lifted out of the saucepan. Remove from the heat and let cool slightly.","4. Transfer the condensed coconut milk to a sterilized jar to fully cool off. Transfer to the fridge for at least one hour, it will thicken more in the fridge as it cools**. Enjoy!"]
713.title: Vegan Sweetened Condensed Milk

714.ingredients: [⅓cup(80 mL)brewed espresso, ¼cup(60 mL)sweetened condensed coconut milk, 2cups(222 g)ice cubes, 1cup(240 mL)unsweetened oat milk]
714.recipe: ["1. In a cup or glass, mix together the freshly brewed espresso with the condensed coconut milk. Stir together while the espresso is hot, so the condensed milk fully dissolves.","2. Divide the ice cubes and espresso mix between the glasses.","3. Top each drink with the oat milk, give it a stir, and enjoy!"]
714.title: Sweetened Condensed Milk Iced Coffee

715.ingredients: [1cup(240 mL)strong pour-over coffee, 3cups(720 mL)unsweetened coconut milk beverage, 2 tsp(10 mL)pure vanilla extract, ¼cup(60 mL)hot water, ¼cup(56 g)granulated sugar, 2 tsp(4 g)espresso powder]
715.recipe: ["1. Pour the brewed coffee into an ice cube tray and freeze. In a pitcher, combine the coconut milk and vanilla. Store in the fridge until ready to use.","2. In a large bowl, add the water, sugar and espresso powder and whip with a electric hand mixer for 4 - 5 minutes or until soft peaks form. Alternatively, you could also whip it by hand using a whisk which will take about 8 - 12 minutes.","3. To serve, add the coffee ice cubes to a glass. Fill half the cup with the vanilla milk, and top the other half with whipped coffee*. Stir and enjoy."]
715.title: Coconut Vanilla Iced Coffee with Coffee Whip

716.ingredients: [1cup(80 g)whole coffee beans, 3cups(720 mL)water, room temperature or cold, 1cup(240 mL)vegan whipping cream†, ½cup(120 mL)unsweetened soy milk, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)pure vanilla extract, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)agave syrup, 1½cups(360 mL)cold water, 1¼cups(139 g)ice cubes]
716.recipe: ["1. Grind the coffee beans to a medium-coarse consistency.","2. In a French press or large mason jar, combine the coffee grinds and water. Stir and top with the lid. Steep at room temperature or in the fridge for 12 - 24 hours. The longer it sits, the stronger the coffee taste.","3. To make the vanilla cream, combine the cream, soy milk, vanilla, and agave syrup in a separate jar, and store in the fridge until ready to use.","4. The next day, place a strainer over a bowl lined with cheese cloth (or nut milk bag). Strain the grounds through the cheesecloth. If desired, filter the coffee through a second time to remove any residual ground beans. The liquid that remains in the bowl is now your cold brew coffee concentrate!","5. To make the drink, fill a glass with ice. Then pour in 2 parts cold brew concentrate, 1 part cold water, and 1 part vanilla cream. Stir and enjoy!"]
716.title: Cold Brew Coffee with Vanilla Cream

717.ingredients: [2cups(162 g)rolled oats, ½cup(72 g)raw pumpkin seeds, ½cup(62 g)raw sunflower seeds, ½cup(58 g)raw walnuts, ½cup(54 g)raw pecans, ⅓cup(35 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, ¼cup(19 g)unsweetened shredded coconut, 2 Tbsp(21 g)whole chia seeds, ½ tspsalt, ½cup(120 mL)maple syrup, ¼cup(60 mL)melted refined coconut oil†, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract (optional), 1.7 oz(50 g)dairy-free dark chocolate, roughly chopped]
717.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 340°F (170°C) and line a baking tray with a piece of parchment paper.","2. To a food processor, add the oats, pumpkin and sunflower seeds, walnuts, pecans, cocoa, coconut, chia seeds, and salt. Give it a few pulses to roughly chop the oats, seeds and nuts. If you don't have a food processor, you can also coarsely chop the nuts and seeds with a knife.","3. Remove the blade from the food processor. If the blades can't be removed, transfer the contents to a large bowl instead. Add the maple syrup, coconut oil, and vanilla and mix using a rubber spatula.","4. Transfer the mixture to the baking tray and spread it out evenly. Let the granola bake in the oven on the centre rack for 20 - 22 minutes, stirring halfway to ensure even baking.","5. Remove from the oven and allow the granola to cool completely. It will harden as it cools. Once completely cool, mix in the chocolate chunks, and enjoy with milk or yogurt and fresh fruit."]
717.title: Double Chocolate Granola

718.ingredients: [4large (25 cm) soft tortillas, 1½ Tbsp(22 mL)vegetable oil, ½ tspsalt, ¼ tsppaprika powder, ⅛ tspground black pepper]
718.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Cut each tortilla into 12 pieces and transfer the pieces to a large bowl.","2. Pour half the oil over the tortillas, toss, then add the remaining oil*. Toss again. Sprinkle over the salt, paprika, and pepper and mix again, ensuring all pieces have some seasoning on them.","3. Lay the pieces in a single layer* over two lined baking trays. Bake in the oven on the middle and lowest rack for 3 - 4 minutes. Rotate the pans and bake for another 3 - 4 minutes.","4. Remove from the oven when the edges of the chips are toasted. Keep an eye on them during baking because they can easily over toast.","5. Serve the chips with your favourite salsa, dip or spread and enjoy!"]
718.title: Baked Tortilla Chips

719.ingredients: [½avocado, 1frozen banana, 1cup(240 mL)unsweetened oat milk†, ½cup(120 mL)unsweetened soy yogurt, 1cup(150 g)frozen blueberries†, ½cup(75 g)frozen pineapple chunks, 2cardamom pods, seeds only (optional) , ½ tsppure vanilla extract, ⅛ tspground cinnamon, hemp seeds, unsweetened shredded coconut]
719.recipe: ["1. Add all ingredients to a high-speed blender and blend until smooth.","2. Pour the smoothie in tall glasses and top with desired garnish. Enjoy!"]
719.title: Cardamom Avocado & Blueberry Smoothie

720.ingredients: [2frozen bananas, 3soft Medjool dates, pits removed, 1cup(240 mL)unsweetened cashew milk†, 3 Tbsp(45 mL)tahini, 2 Tbsp(14 g)ground flaxseeds, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, 1 tsp(3 g)ground cinnamon, ⅛ tspsalt, chopped dairy-free dark chocolate, fresh strawberries, hazelnut butter, roasted cashews]
720.recipe: ["1. In a high-speed blender, add all the ingredients and blend on high until smooth.","2. Divide the smoothie between bowls, add your favourite toppings, and enjoy!"]
720.title: Salted Caramel Smoothie Bowl

721.ingredients: [2cups(60 g)fresh spinach, 1cup(150 g)frozen pineapple chunks, ¾cup(180 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, ½cup(52 g)frozen cucumber slices, ½avocado, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)almond butter, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)maple syrup, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)pure vanilla extract, fresh berries, unsweetened shredded coconut, whole chia seeds]
721.recipe: ["1. Add all of the smoothie ingredients to a blender.","2. Blend on high until everything smooth.","3. Pour into bowls and add desired toppings. Alternatively, pour into a glass and drink as is. Enjoy!"]
721.title: The Extraordinary Green Smoothie Bowl

722.ingredients: [⅓cup(50 g)frozen strawberries, ½cup(40 g)rolled oats, ½cup(120 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)cashew butter, 1lemon, juiced, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)maple syrup, 1 Tbsp(7 g)ground flaxseeds, ½ tsppure vanilla extract, ⅓cup(80 mL)unsweetened coconut yogurt, fresh strawberries, vegan granola]
722.recipe: ["1. In a small bowl, microwave* the strawberries on high for 1 - 2 minutes. Mash the thawed strawberries with a fork, and let sit to cool slightly.","2. In a medium bowl, combine the oats, milk, cashew butter, lemon juice, maple syrup, flaxseeds, and vanilla.","3. Add the thawed berry mixture to the bottom of a mason jar or airtight container, then add the oat mixture on top of that. Seal the container, and let it sit overnight in the fridge.","4. The next morning, top with yogurt and other desired toppings, and enjoy!"]
722.title: Strawberry Cheesecake Overnight Oats

723.ingredients: [¾cup(112 g)frozen blueberries, ½cup(120 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, ½cup(40 g)rolled oats, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)cashew butter, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)maple syrup, 1 Tbsp(7 g)ground flaxseeds, 1 Tbsp(7 g)chopped roasted pecans, ¼ tspground cinnamon, ⅓cup(80 mL)unsweetened soy yogurt, fresh blueberries]
723.recipe: ["1. Add the blueberries to a saucepan on medium-high heat. Cook for 3 - 4 minutes, mashing slightly as it's stirred. Alternatively, thaw the blueberries in the microwave. Remove from the heat and let cool slightly.","2. In a medium bowl, combine all of the remaining ingredients, except for the yogurt.","3. Add half of the stewed blueberries to the bottom of a mason jar or airtight container. Add the oat mixture next. Then add the yogurt and the other half of the stewed blueberries on top.","4. Cover and let it sit overnight in the fridge. The next morning it's ready to enjoy!"]
723.title: Blueberry Muffin Overnight Oats

724.ingredients: [½cup(120 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, ½cup(40 g)rolled oats, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)cashew butter, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)maple syrup, 1 Tbsp(10 g)whole chia seeds, 1 Tbsp(15 g)mini dark chocolate chips, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, ½cup(62 g)fresh raspberries, 2½ Tbsp(13 g)rolled oats, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)cashew butter, 1 Tbsp(15 g)mini dark chocolate chips, ½ Tbsp(7 mL)maple syrup, fresh mint leaves]
724.recipe: ["1. Combine all of the overnight oats ingredients, except for the raspberries, in a mason jar or airtight container.","2. To make the optional cookie dough bites, mix the ingredients in a bowl. Then using your fingers, press little bits of the mixture into balls. Add these on top of the oats.","3. Cover and place in the fridge overnight. The next morning, top with fruit and enjoy!"]
724.title: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Overnight Oats

725.ingredients: [1apple, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)water, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)maple syrup, ½ tspground cinnamon, ½cup(120 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, ½cup(40 g)rolled oats, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)almond butter, 1 Tbsp(10 g)raisins, 1 Tbsp(10 g)whole chia seeds, 1 Tbsp(7 g)chopped roasted walnuts, ½ tspground cinnamon, ½ tsppure vanilla extract, ⅓cup(80 mL)unsweetened coconut yogurt]
725.recipe: ["1. Cut just over half of the apple into bite-sized cubes, and add these to a medium pan. Mince or grate the other half of the apple and add to a mason jar or airtight container.","2. To the pan, add the water, maple syrup, and cinnamon. Cook over medium-high heat, and allow the apples to soften for about 8 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from the heat and let cool.","3. Add all of the other ingredients to the jar, and mix to combine.  Add the cooked apple chunks to the top. Cover and let it sit overnight in the fridge. The next morning, top with yogurt and enjoy!"]
725.title: Apple Pie Overnight Oats

726.ingredients: [3cups(390 g)raw cashews, chocolate chip cookie dough overnight oats, lemon yogurt parfait, strawberry cheesecake overnight oats]
726.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Spread the cashews in a single layer over a baking tray. Roast in the oven on the centre rack for 9 - 11 minutes, or until the cashews are a golden colour. Stir once or twice while roasting.","2. Transfer the cooled roasted nuts to a high-powered food processor* (ideally 600W or more) and blend on high for 5 - 7 minutes, or until smooth**.","3. Transfer to a mason jar and enjoy!"]
726.title: Cashew Butter

727.ingredients: [½cup(40 g)rolled oats, ½cup(120 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, 1 Tbsp(7 g)ground flaxseeds, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)almond butter, 1 Tbsp(7 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, ¼ tspalmond extract, ¼cup(65 g)cherry pie filling, ⅓cup(80 mL)unsweetened coconut yogurt, chocolate shavings, fresh cherry]
727.recipe: ["1. In a small bowl, mix the oats, milk, flaxseeds, almond butter, cocoa, and almond extract.","2. Spoon the mixture into a mason jar, alternating with spoonfuls of the cherry pie filling. Cover and place in the fridge overnight.","3. In the morning, top with yogurt and other desired toppings and enjoy!"]
727.title: Black Forest Overnight Oats

728.ingredients: [1cup(240 mL)peanut butter, 3soft Medjool dates, pits removed†, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, ¼ tspsalt, 1¼cups(94 g)unsweetened shredded coconut, 5.2 oz(150 g)dairy-free dark chocolate, roasted peanuts, toasted coconut flakes]
728.recipe: ["1. To a food processor*, add the peanut butter, dates, vanilla, and salt. Blend until smooth. Then remove the blade from the food processor and use a spoon to mix in the shredded coconut.","2. Scoop up a tablespoon of the mixture and roll it into a ball**. Transfer the rolled balls to a plate and place them in the fridge or freezer.","3. Meanwhile, melt the chocolate in a microwave or on a stovetop, using a double boiler. Let the chocolate cool off a little bit. Then line a baking tray or plate with parchment paper.","4. Take the peanut butter balls out of the fridge and use two forks to dip the balls into the chocolate to coat them completely. Let the excess chocolate drip off and transfer to the parchment paper.","5. If desired, sprinkle with a topping before the chocolate has hardened. Enjoy!"]
728.title: Chocolate Coconut Peanut Butter Balls

729.ingredients: [½cup(64 g)raw sesame seeds, ¼cup(36 g)raw pumpkin seeds, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)maple syrup, 1½ Tbsp(18 g)coconut sugar, ½ Tbsp(7 mL)melted coconut oil]
729.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C) degrees. To a medium bowl, add all of the ingredients, mix well, then transfer the mixture to a lined baking tray.","2. Add another piece of parchment paper on top and roll it flat using a rolling pin. Use your fingers or the back of a spoon to tuck in the sides to create a rectangular shape.","3. Remove the top parchment paper, and bake in the middle rack of the oven for 18 - 20 minutes, or until lightly golden. When removed from the oven, let it cool completely. It will continue to harden as it cools. When cooled, slice the sesame slab into bite-sized squares. Enjoy!"]
729.title: Crunchy Sesame Snaps

730.ingredients: [3 Tbsp(23 g)roasted pistachios, minced , ¼cup(5 g)freeze dried raspberries, minced, 2 Tbsp(10 g)toasted coconut flakes, 2 Tbsp(25 g)candied pineapple pieces, 1 Tbsp(1 g)dried red rose petals, crushed (optional) , 2 tsp(7 g)hemp seeds, 14.1 oz(400 g)dairy-free dark chocolate, broken into pieces]
730.recipe: ["1. Prepare and have at-the-ready your desired toppings: the pistachios, dried raspberries, coconut flakes, hemp seeds, candied pineapple, and rose petals. Line a baking tray with parchment paper.","2. Fill a saucepan one-quarter full with water, and bring to a gentle boil. Place a large heat-safe bowl on top of the pan and add the chocolate. The heat from the bowl will melt the chocolate. Stir throughout.","3. Once melted, remove the bowl from the stove (be careful as the bowl will be hot). Pour the melted chocolate onto the baking tray.","4. Use the back of a rubber spatula to spread the chocolate out into a thin layer, about ½ cm thick.","5. Sprinkle over top all of the toppings. Then use the back of a spoon to gently press down the pieces into the chocolate. Place the chocolate bark in the fridge for at least 1 hour to harden.","6. Once solid, let slightly soften at room temperature for a minute before cutting to avoid it snapping in other places. Cut into your desired shapes and sizes. Enjoy!"]
730.title: Raspberry Rose Chocolate Bark

731.ingredients: [⅓cup(76 g)margarine, ⅓cup(73 g)brown sugar, packed, ⅓cup(80 mL)coconut cream†, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)maple syrup, ¼ tspsalt, ¼ tsppure vanilla extract]
731.recipe: ["1. To a saucepan, add all the ingredients except for the vanilla. Stir continuously while you bring it to a boil, then reduce to a simmer, cooking uncovered for 8 - 10 minutes to allow the sauce to thicken. Stir occasionally to prevent burning.","2. Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the vanilla extract. Allow the caramel sauce to sit and cool; it will continue to thicken as it cools, and thickens even more once refrigerated. Enjoy!"]
731.title: Vegan Caramel Sauce

732.ingredients: [¼cup(56 g)granulated sugar, ¼cup(18 g)banana chips, chopped, ¼cup(29 g)roasted hazelnuts, chopped, 2gingerbread cookies, chopped , 2 tsp(10 mL)peanut butter (optional), ¼ tspflaked sea salt, 14.1 oz(400 g)dairy-free dark chocolate]
732.recipe: ["1. Line a baking tray with parchment paper. In a heavy-bottomed saucepan* on medium heat, add the sugar and water.","2. Avoid mixing with spoons or utensils as this can cause sugar crystals to form. If the mixture needs it, swirl the pan to help dissolve the sugar.","3. When the sugar is dissolved, turn the heat to medium-high and allow the mixture to bubble until it starts to turn golden, about 10 - 15 minutes.","4. Watch the sugar closely to avoid burning, as caramelization happens quickly. When caramelized to your liking, carefully** pour the liquid sugar onto the prepared baking tray.","5. Tilt the tray to spread the sugar out if desired for thinner shards.","6. Once completely cooled, use the back of a spoon to tap the caramel and break it into shards. Place these in a bowl and set aside. Keep the paper on the baking tray as it will be used again.","7. Prepare and have at-the-ready your desired toppings: banana chips, hazelnuts, cookies, peanut butter, and salt.","8. Melt the chocolate in a microwave or on the stove, using a double boiler.","9. Once melted, remove the bowl from the microwave or the stove, and be careful as the bowl will be hot. Gently pour the melted chocolate onto the same parchment-lined baking tray used before. Use the back of a rubber spatula to spread the chocolate out into a thin layer, about ½ cm thick.","10. The chocolate can now be decorated! Drizzle the peanut butter over the chocolate, and then sprinkle over top the banana chips, hazelnuts, cookie crumbles, salt, and caramel shards. Using the back of a spoon, gently press the pieces into the chocolate to secure them.","11. Let harden at room temperature, or place in the fridge to harden. Once hard, let slightly soften at room temperature before cutting. Cut into desired shapes and sizes. Enjoy!"]
732.title: Rocky Mountain Chocolate Bark

733.ingredients: [1½cups(150 g)raw pecans, 1½cups(195 g)raw cashews, 1 Tbsp(8 g)ground cinnamon, ½ tsppure vanilla extract, ¼ tspsalt]
733.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Spread the cashews on one baking tray, and the pecans on another. Toast for 7 minutes. Remove the pecans from the oven. They should be toasted enough. Set aside to cool.","2. Stir the cashews and return them to the oven to continue to bake for an additional 5 - 7 minutes, or until lightly golden. Careful not to burn. When toasted, remove from the oven.","3. To a food processor (ideally 600W or higher), add the toasted nuts, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt. Blend on high for 5 - 7 minutes until a smooth*.","4. Transfer to a jar for storage. Enjoy!"]
733.title: Cinnamon Vanilla Nut Butter

734.ingredients: [3cups(720 mL)barista oat milk, ½cup(120 mL)brewed espresso, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)maple syrup, ½ Tbsp(7 mL)blackstrap molasses†, 1 tsp(3 g)ground cinnamon, ½ tspground ginger, 1 pinchground nutmeg, 1 pinchground cloves, coconut whip, crushed gingerbread cookies, vegan whipped cream]
734.recipe: ["1. Add the barista milk to a saucepan on high heat. Whisk throughout to create some froth. Stay with it, as it often only needs a minute to heat through. When the milk starts to simmer, remove the pan from the heat and pour it into your desired mugs.","2. Return the saucepan to the stove on medium heat, and whisk together the espresso, maple syrup, molasses, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, and clove. Let everything heat through.","3. Divide the espresso mixture between your mugs and top with whipped cream and cookie crumbles, if desired. Serve while hot, and enjoy!"]
734.title: Vegan Gingerbread Latte

735.ingredients: [½cup(120 mL)canned full-fat coconut milk†, ¼cup(48 g)coconut sugar, ½ tspground cinnamon, 1½cups(360 mL)barista oat milk†, ⅛ tsppure vanilla extract (optional), ½cup(120 mL)brewed espresso, foamed milk, ground cinnamon]
735.recipe: ["1. To a saucepan, add coconut milk, coconut sugar, and cinnamon. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer, cooking uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir often to prevent it from burning.","2. When the coconut mixture has thickened and resembles a caramel sauce, add the milk and vanilla, and whisk to combine. Bring to a boil, then remove from the heat.","3. Brew the espresso into your desired cups*.","4. Pour the warm cinnamon coconut milk mixture overtop your espresso. Top with foamed milk and a sprinkle of cinnamon if desired. Enjoy!"]
735.title: Cinnamon Coconut Cream Latte

736.ingredients: [1 Tbsp(7 g)ground flaxseeds, 3 Tbsp(45 mL)water, 2ripe bananas, 1½cups(360 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, 2cups(162 g)rolled oats, 2 tsp(5 g)ground cinnamon, 1 tsp(3 g)baking powder, ½ tspsalt, ⅓cup(36 g)raw pecans, roughly chopped, ¾cup(112 g)fresh blueberries, ¾cup(114 g)fresh strawberries, thinly sliced , almond butter, fresh blueberries, maple syrup, unsweetened soy yogurt]
736.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C) and lightly grease a 9 x 12 inch (23 x 31 cm) baking dish.","2. To a large bowl, add the flaxseeds and water. Mix and let rest for about 5 minutes to gel.","3. To the large bowl, add the bananas and mash well. Then add the milk and vanilla, and stir to combine.","4. Then add all the oats, cinnamon, baking powder, salt, and pecans. Mix.","5. Gently fold in the blueberries and strawberries.","6. Pour the mixture into the baking dish, and spread it out evenly. If desired, decorate the top with some more strawberry slices, blueberries, and raw pecans. Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 35 - 40 minutes, or until firm and lightly golden on the top.","7. When removed from the oven, allow it to cool for a few minutes before slicing. Add desired toppings, and enjoy!"]
736.title: Baked Berry & Pecan Oatmeal

737.ingredients: [2½cups(202 g)rolled oats, 1cup(70 g)puffed quinoa, ½cup(72 g)raw almonds, coarsely chopped, ½cup(38 g)unsweetened shredded coconut, ½cup(72 g)roasted pumpkin seeds, ¼cup(45 g)brown sugar, ½ tspground cinnamon, ¼cup(60 mL)vegetable oil, ¼cup(60 mL)maple syrup, ¼cup(60 mL)almond butter, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, ¾ tspsalt, 2 Tbsp(20 g)hemp seeds, ½cup(80 g)dried mango, thinly sliced]
737.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 320°F (160°C). To a large bowl, add the oats, puffed quinoa, almonds, coconut, pumpkin seeds, brown sugar, and cinnamon, and give it a stir.","2. To a separate medium bowl, add the oil, syrup, almond butter, vanilla, and salt. Whisk until it's all combined into a smooth caramel-like sauce.","3. Pour this wet mix over the dry mix, and stir until coated.","4. Transfer to a large lined baking tray and spread it out. Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 30 minutes, or until lightly golden, stopping stir once halfway.","5. Remove from the oven and allow it to cool. It continues to harden as it cools. Add the hemp seeds and dried mango, and toss.","6. When completely cooled, transfer the granola to a storage container. Enjoy with fruit, and yogurt or milk for breakfast, or as a snack!"]
737.title: Crunchy Almond & Mango Granola

738.ingredients: [2cups(162 g)rolled oats, 1cup(240 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, ⅓cup(80 mL)unsweetened applesauce, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)maple syrup, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)melted refined coconut oil, plus extra for frying†, 2 tsp(5 g)ground cinnamon, 1 tsp(3 g)baking powder, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, ½ tspsalt, any nut butter of choice, fresh fruit, maple syrup, roasted pistachios, unsweetened coconut yogurt]
738.recipe: ["1. In a food processor, blend the oatmeal into a flour. Alternatively, use store-bought oatmeal flour.","2. Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl.","3. Preheat a large pan on medium-high heat with the oil. When hot, spoon about ¼ cup of batter onto the pan for each pancake and cook for about 2 minutes.","4. When the bottom becomes golden, flip and cook for another 2 minutes, or until lightly golden.","5. For a more balanced breakfast, enjoy these pancakes with some creamy nut butter drizzled overtop, fresh fruit, and creamy plant-based yogurt."]
738.title: Simple Oatmeal Pancakes

739.ingredients: [7digestive cookies†, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)melted refined coconut oil†, 10.5 oz(300 g)silken tofu, 1lemon, zested, juiced , ⅓cup(80 mL)coconut cream†, 2 Tbsp(28 g)granulated sugar, 1 Tbsp(8 g)cornstarch, 2 tsp(10 mL)pure vanilla extract, fresh berries, lemon slices, stewed berries, toasted coconut flakes]
739.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). In a small food processor, blend the cookies and coconut oil into a crumb. Alternatively, crush it all together using a fork if you don't have a food processor.","2. Pour the crust mixture into a 17-inch (18 cm) spring form pan. Use the flat bottom of a cup to press the crumbs into a crust*.","3. In a blender, combine the tofu, lemon zest and juice, coconut milk, sugar, cornstarch, and vanilla. Pour the mixture into the prepared crust.","4. Lightly tap the pan on a solid surface to get rid of any bubbles.","5. Bake in the centre rack of the oven for 25 - 30 minutes, until the edges are lightly golden and the topped is cracked**.","6. Let cool at room temp for 30 minutes, then transfer to the fridge for at least 3 hours to set. Best if it can be let to cool overnight, although not necessary.","7. Decorate with toppings just before servings. Enjoy!"]
739.title: Coconut Lemon Custard Tart

740.ingredients: [2cups(480 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, 1small cooked beet, 2soft Medjool dates, pits removed, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, 1cinnamon stick, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)maple syrup (optional), 2 Tbsp(30 mL)brewed espresso (optional)]
740.recipe: ["1. Combine the soy milk, beet, dates, and vanilla extract in a high-powered blender until smooth and creamy.","2. Pour this mixture straight into a saucepan. If your blender isn't very powerful, or if you don't like small fibres to remain in your drink, strain the mixture through a sieve while pouring it into the saucepan.","3. Place on the stove on medium-high heat and add in a stick of cinnamon. Let the mixture heat up, stirring throughout to prevent burning.","4. Taste test, and if you like it sweeter add some maple syrup. Let simmer for about 3 minutes, then remove the cinnamon stick.","5. To a mug, add a shot of espresso (optional), and then pour over the beetroot-infused milk. Stir, and enjoy!"]
740.title: Beetroot Latte

741.ingredients: [1cup(240 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, 1cup(240 mL)canned full-fat coconut milk, 1 tsp(3 g)ground turmeric, 1 tsp(3 g)ground cinnamon, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, 2soft Medjool dates, pits removed, 1 pinchground black pepper, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)maple syrup (optional), ¼cup(60 mL)brewed espresso (optional)]
741.recipe: ["1. Add all ingredients to a high-speed blender* and blend on high until smooth.","2. Pour this mixture straight into a saucepan. If your blender isn't very powerful, or if you don't like small fibres to remain in your drink, strain the mixture first when pouring it into the saucepan.","3. Bring to a gentle simmer on medium-high heat, stirring throughout. Taste test and add maple syrup if you'd prefer the drink sweeter. When warmed through, remove from the heat.","4. To turn it into a turmeric latte, add some brewed espresso to your cups if desired. Pour the golden milk into the cups, and enjoy!"]
741.title: Golden Milk

742.ingredients: [2½cups(600 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, ½cup(65 g)raw cashews, 4soft Medjool dates, pits removed, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)peanut butter, ¼cup(60 mL)brewed espresso, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, ¼ tspground cinnamon]
742.recipe: ["1. Combine all the ingredients together in a high-speed blender until smooth.","2. Pour into a saucepan on medium-high heat and stir continuously to prevent burning until heated through. If you prefer a thinner consistency, add some more plant milk.","3. Pour into your favourite mugs and enjoy!"]
742.title: Peanut Butter Caramel Latte

743.ingredients: [1½cups(360 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, 1.7 oz(50 g)dairy-free dark chocolate, chopped, 2 Tbsp(13 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 Tbsp(14 g)granulated sugar, 1 Tbsp(6 g)fresh ginger, sliced , 3cinnamon sticks, 6cardamom pods, cracked , 4whole cloves, 1 pinchcayenne pepper (optional), chocolate shavings, cinnamon stick, vegan whipped cream]
743.recipe: ["1. Add all ingredients in a saucepan over medium-high heat and whisk often to avoid scorching the plant milk and chocolate. Let it gently simmer for 3 minutes before removing it from the heat.","2. Pour through a sieve and serve in your favourite mugs.","3. Top with coconut whip if desired. Enjoy!"]
743.title: Chai Hot Chocolate

744.ingredients: [¾cup(124 g)chopped mango, ½cup(40 g)rolled oats, ½cup(120 mL)unsweetened coconut milk beverage†, 1 Tbsp(10 g)whole chia seeds, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)almond butter, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)maple syrup (optional) , ½ tsppure vanilla extract, almond butter, mango, toasted coconut flakes, unsweetened coconut yogurt]
744.recipe: ["1. Add all the ingredients to a mason jar or airtight container. Mix to combine.","2. Add a lid onto the container, and let sit overnight in the fridge.","3. The next morning, add your desired toppings and enjoy!"]
744.title: Tropical Mango Coconut Overnight Oats

745.ingredients: [½cup(40 g)rolled oats, ½cup(120 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)peanut butter, 1 Tbsp(10 g)whole chia seeds, ¼ tspground cinnamon, ½cup(75 g)frozen mixed berries, fresh berries, roasted peanuts, stewed berries, unsweetened coconut yogurt]
745.recipe: ["1. Add the oats, milk, peanut butter, chia seeds, and cinnamon in a mason jar or airtight container. Mix to combine.","2. Then add the frozen berries, and gently mix again. Add a lid onto the container, and let sit overnight in the fridge.","3. The next morning, add your desired toppings and enjoy!"]
745.title: Peanut Butter & Jelly Overnight Oats

746.ingredients: [½cup(40 g)rolled oats, ½cup(120 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)almond butter,  1 Tbsp(7 g)ground flaxseeds, 1 Tbsp(9 g)chopped dairy-free dark chocolate, chocolate shavings, fresh raspberries, medium banana, roasted almonds, unsweetened coconut yogurt]
746.recipe: ["1. Combine all ingredients in a mason jar or airtight container and let sit overnight in the fridge.","2. The next morning, top with desired toppings. To make this a complete meal, add a handful of fresh fruit and/or plant-based yogurt to the top. Enjoy!"]
746.title: Almond Chocolate Overnight Oats

747.ingredients: [½cup(40 g)rolled oats, ½cup(120 mL)unsweetened soy milk, 1 Tbsp(7 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 Tbsp(7 g)ground flaxseeds, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)vegan nutella, 1 Tbsp(9 g)chopped dairy-free dark chocolate, 1 pinchflaked sea salt (optional), almond butter, chocolate shavings, fresh strawberries, unsweetened coconut yogurt]
747.recipe: ["1. Combine all the ingredients in a mason jar or airtight container and let sit overnight in the fridge.","2. The next morning, top with desired toppings. To make this a complete meal, top with some fresh fruit and plant-based yogurt. Enjoy!"]
747.title: Vegan 'Nutella' Overnight Oats

748.ingredients: [1½frozen bananas, 1cup(240 mL)unsweetened oat milk†, ½cup(75 g)frozen chopped zucchini, ¼cup(34 g)roasted cashews, 3soft Medjool dates, pits removed , 1 Tbsp(7 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)brewed espresso, ½ tsppure vanilla extract, chocolate shavings, fresh berries, medium banana, unsweetened shredded coconut, vegan granola]
748.recipe: ["1. Combine all ingredients in a high-speed blender and blend on high until smooth.","2. Pour into bowls and top with desired toppings."]
748.title: Mocha Smoothie

749.ingredients: [1⅓cups(320 mL)coconut cream†, 2 Tbsp(17 g)powdered sugar, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract (optional)]
749.recipe: ["1. Place the coconut milk can upside-down in the refrigerator for at least 5 hours, but best if left in the fridge overnight to allow the liquid to separate from the fat. Refrigerate a large bowl together with the whisks of your electric hand mixer for at least 10 minutes to cool.","2. Gently turn the can back right-side-up, and open the can. Pour out the liquid layer on the top, and save this for a future smoothie or curry. Using a spoon, scoop out the solid white coconut fat into a large bowl.","3. Whip the coconut cream for 3 - 4 minutes.","4. Then add in the icing sugar and vanilla, and whip again for an additional minute.","5. Use the coconut whip to top brownies, fruit crumbles, watermelon pizza, or as a topping on your favourite hot chocolate*."]
749.title: Coconut Whip

750.ingredients: [½cup(120 mL)almond butter, 2 Tbsp(13 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)maple syrup, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)unsweetened soy milk]
750.recipe: ["1. Mix all the ingredients in a small bowl, and enjoy as a spread on toast, or as a dip for fresh fruit."]
750.title: 2-Minute Chocolate Almond Spread

751.ingredients: [1cup(190 g)soft Medjool dates, pits removed, 2cups(162 g)rolled oats, 1cup(240 mL)almond butter, ¼cup(28 g)ground flaxseeds, 1 tsp(3 g)ground cinnamon, 1½cups(360 mL)unsweetened soy yogurt, 1cup(150 g)stewed berries]
751.recipe: ["1. In a food processor, blend the dates until smooth.","2. Add the oats, almond butter, ground flaxseed, and cinnamon. Blend again until well combined, stopping to scrape down the sides as needed.","3. Transfer the mix to an 11 x 7 inch (18 x 28cm) parchment-lined baking dish and press firmly into the base of the dish.","4. Top with the yogurt and spread out evenly.","5. Dot the yogurt with the stewed berries and use a butter knife to swirl.","6. Place into the freezer and let freeze for 1 - 2 hours, or until the bars are solid enough to cut.","7. When removed from the freezer, cut into squares or bars of the desired size.","8. Let thaw for 3 - 5 minutes before enjoying."]
751.title: Frozen Yogurt Breakfast Bars

752.ingredients: [6cups(900 g)mixed fresh berries, 1cup(81 g)rolled oats, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)melted refined coconut oil†, 1 Tbsp(14 g)brown sugar, 1 tsp(3 g)ground cinnamon, roasted pecans, unsweetened coconut yogurt, vegan vanilla ice cream]
752.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F). If using larger berries, such as strawberries, first slice*. Divide the fruit into ramekins, or place it into a large baking dish.","2. In a bowl, combine the oats, melted coconut oil, brown sugar, and cinnamon. Mix to combine, then spoon over the fruit.","3. Bake on the middle rack of the oven for 10 - 15 minutes, or until the juices are bubbly, the fruit is tender, and the oatmeal is golden.","4. Remove from oven, let cool for a few minutes before serving. Top with plant yogurt, vegan ice cream, or coconut whip. Enjoy!"]
752.title: Baked Fruit Crumble - Three Ways

753.ingredients: [1⅔cups(399 mL)canned full-fat coconut milk, ½cup(120 mL)pineapple juice, ½lime, juiced , ¾cup(112 g)frozen raspberries]
753.recipe: ["1. To a medium bowl, add the coconut milk, pineapple juice, and lime juice and mix.","2. Pour this mixture into popsicle molds until each well is about 80 - 90% full*. Place the mold into the freezer for 1 - 2 hours.","3. Meanwhile, heat the frozen raspberries in a small saucepan on the stove on medium-low heat for 3 - 5 minutes, or until fully thawed. Mash slightly to release some of the juices. Alternatively, the berries can also be thawed in the microwave. Set aside to let cool.","4. After the 1 - 2 hours is up, remove the mold from the freezer and spoon the raspberry mixture onto the popsicles.","5. Use a popsicle stick to gently push the raspberries into the popsicle to create a swirl pattern. Then carefully position the popsicle sticks in the center of the mold and return to the freezer*. Let the popsicles freeze completely.","6. When you want to remove a popsicle, run the bottom of the mold under hot water for a minute and twist each side to help release the popsicle. Enjoy!"]
753.title: Tropical Coconut Popsicles

754.ingredients: [2cups(380 g)soft Medjool dates, pits removed, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)melted refined coconut oil†, ½cup(53 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, 1 Tbsp(15 mL)water, ½cup(55 g)roasted pecans, ⅓cup(50 g)chopped dairy-free dark chocolate, 1 pinchflaked sea salt (optional)]
754.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). In a food processor, blend the dates, coconut oil, cocoa powder, and water until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides as needed. Alternatively, if you don't have a food processor, mash the dates with a fork and mix the ingredients in a bowl.","2. Add the roasted pecans, chocolate, and a pinch of salt. Blend again, but let some chunks of pecans and chocolate remain.","3. Transfer the mixture into a parchment-lined 9 x 9 inch (21 x 21 cm) baking dish, and spread evenly. Bake on the middle rack of the oven for 10 minutes. Alternatively, skip the baking and put them straight into the fridge for chewy no-bake brownies.","4. When removed from the oven, top with some more crushed pecans, chopped chocolate, and a sprinkle of sea salt if desired. Gently press these in to secure them.","5. Let cool before cutting. These brownies are fudgiest if kept in the fridge. Enjoy!"]
754.title: Ultra Fudgy Sea Salt Caramel Brownies

755.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Place the almonds onto a baking tray, and toast in the oven for 7 - 10 minutes, stirring occasionally until lightly golden*.","2. Add the toasted almonds to a high-powered food processor** (ideally 600W or higher) and blend on high for 5 - 7 minutes until creamy.","3. Continue to blend until smooth. Stopping too soon results in a thicker consistency. If your food processor isn't very powerful, you may need to blend it for an extra 5 minutes to achieve the desired consistency or consider adding a bit of oil to help the process along. Enjoy!"]
755.title: Homemade Almond Butter

756.ingredients: [1 Tbsp(7 g)ground flaxseeds, 3 Tbsp(45 mL)water, ¼cup(34 g)roasted hazelnuts, ¾cup(142 g)soft Medjool dates, pits removed, ⅓cup(35 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, ¼cup(60 mL)unsweetened soy milk, ¼cup(60 mL)almond butter, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, 1 tsp(1 g)instant coffee granules (optional), ¼ tspsalt, ⅓cup(56 g)dairy-free dark chocolate chips, almond butter, berry chia jam, cashew butter, hazelnut butter, peanut butter, vegan nutella]
756.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). In a small bowl, combine the ground flaxseeds and water and let sit for 5 minutes to gel.","2. Meanwhile, in a food processor, add the roasted hazelnuts and blend until you achieve a coarse flour-like consistency. Add to a medium-sized mixing bowl.","3. Back to the food processor, add the dates and blend until they combine into a softball. Alternatively, you can mash with the back of a fork if the dates are soft enough.","4. Transfer the mashed dates to the mixing bowl of ground hazelnuts, add the flaxseed gel, and all the remaining ingredients. Mix until well combined.","5. Line or oil a mini muffin tin, and spoon about a tablespoon of batter into each well. Bake on the centre rack for 15-20 minutes or until the top is firm and a toothpick comes out clean.","6. Cool for a couple of minutes before removing from the tin. Top with some homemade berry chia jam and a drizzle of nut butter. Enjoy!"]
756.title: Sugar-Free Fudgy Two-Bite Brownies

757.ingredients: [3cups(720 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, 4soft Medjool dates, pits removed, 3 Tbsp(20 g)Dutch processed cocoa powder, 1½ tsp(4 g)ground cinnamon, ½ tspground turmeric, ½ tsppure vanilla extract, 1 pinchground nutmeg (optional) , 1 pinchground black pepper]
757.recipe: ["1. Add all the ingredients to a blender*, and blend until smooth.","2. Transfer to a saucepan and bring to a gentle simmer over medium heat. Stir continuously to prevent scorching the milk.","3. Remove from heat and enjoy!"]
757.title: Golden Vegan Hot Chocolate

758.ingredients: [2cups(480 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, 2Earl Grey tea bags, 1 tsp(5 mL)maple syrup, or more to taste, ½ tsppure vanilla extract, ⅛ tspground cinnamon]
758.recipe: ["1. To a saucepan on medium heat*, add the milk, tea bags, maple syrup, vanilla, and cinnamon. Stir and whisk throughout to avoid burning. As soon as the milk starts to simmer, remove it from the heat.","2. Cover and allow to sit and steep for 1 - 2 minutes further for a stronger tea flavour. Then remove the tea bags.","3. Pour into your favourite mug and enjoy!"]
758.title: Creamy & Rich London Fog

759.ingredients: [1cup(160 g)steel-cut oats, soaked overnight, drained, 1⅔cups(399 mL)canned light coconut milk, 1cup(240 mL)unsweetened soy milk†, 1medium banana, sliced , 1 Tbsp(7 g)ground flaxseeds, ½ tspground cinnamon, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, 1cup(150 g)fresh fruit, 3 Tbsp(15 g)toasted coconut flakes, 3 Tbsp(21 g)roasted pecans]
759.recipe: ["1. To a saucepan, add the oats, coconut milk, plant milk, banana, flaxseeds, and cinnamon. Bring to a boil, reduce to a gentle simmer and allow to cook for 15 minutes*, stirring occasionally.","2. Add more milk if a thinner consistency is preferred, or cook for another couple of minutes to thicken. Stir in the vanilla and remove it from the heat.","3. Add your favourite toppings, and enjoy!"]
759.title: Nourishing Coconut Milk Oatmeal

760.ingredients: [1cup(135 g)raw blanched hazelnuts, 2 Tbsp(14 g)ground flaxseeds, 6 Tbsp(90 mL)water, 1 tsp(3 g)ground cinnamon, ½ tspsalt, 2½cups(202 g)rolled oats, divided, ¾cup(142 g)soft Medjool dates, pits removed, ½cup(120 mL)almond butter, ⅓cup(73 g)refined coconut oil, soft or melted†, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, ½cup(80 g)dried cranberries, chopped, ¼cup(36 g)raw pumpkin seeds, ¼cup(27 g)raw pecans, 1.4 oz(40 g)dairy-free dark chocolate, chopped, dairy-free dark chocolate chips, dried cranberries, hemp seeds, unsweetened coconut flakes]
760.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Spread the hazelnuts onto a baking tray and roast for 8 - 10 minutes, or until lightly golden, stirring once halfway.","2. To a small bowl, add the ground flaxseeds and water. Mix and let sit for 5 minutes to gel.","3. Line or lightly grease a 9 x 13 inch (18 x 27 cm) baking dish.","4. To the food processor, add the hazelnuts, cinnamon, salt, and half of the oats. Blend into a flour.","5. Transfer to a large bowl and add the remaining oats to the bowl as well.","6. Returning to the empty food processor, add the dates and blend until a paste is formed.","7. Then add the almond butter, coconut oil, vanilla extract, and gelled flaxseeds. Blend until well combined.","8. Transfer the sticky mixture from the food processor into the large bowl with the dry ingredients. Add the cranberries, pumpkin seeds, pecans, and chocolate to the bowl as well. Mix well.","9. Transfer the mixture to the baking dish, and press down firmly to smooth out the top. If desired, press on any of the optional toppings for decoration.","10. Bake on the centre rack of the oven until lightly golden, about 14 - 17 minutes.","11. Let cool completely, before cutting into bars."]
760.title: Hazelnut Granola Breakfast Bars

761.ingredients: [1cup(190 g)soft Medjool dates, pits removed, 2 Tbsp(14 g)ground flaxseeds, 3 Tbsp(45 mL)water, 1cup(81 g)rolled oats, ½cup(62 g)raw pistachios, ½cup(65 g)raw cashews, ⅓cup(53 g)dried cranberries, ¼cup(42 g)dairy-free dark chocolate chips, 2 Tbsp(30 mL)maple syrup, 1 tsp(5 mL)pure vanilla extract, ¼ tspground cinnamon (optional), 1 pinchsalt]
761.recipe: ["1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). In a large bowl, mash the dates with a fork until smooth. Alternatively, you could use a food processor.","2. Then add the ground flaxseeds and water. Let sit for 5 minutes to gel.","3. Add the rolled oats and nuts (if not pre-roasted) to a baking tray and roast in the oven for 8 - 10 minutes, or until lightly golden, stirring once halfway.","4. Remove the oats and nuts from the oven and let cool. Then finely chop. Alternatively, pulse a few times in a food processor.","5. To the large bowl with the dates, add the chopped oats and nuts, cranberries, chocolate, maple syrup, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt. Mix well.","6. Roll into bite-size balls.
